settings.question: HOW CAN I CONTACT CUSTOMER SERVICE?
settings.answer: You can contact our customer service team via email at support@tashola.com or through our contact form. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours.

settings.question: WHAT ARE YOUR BUSINESS HOURS?
settings.answer: Our customer service team is available Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM GMT. We are closed on weekends and public holidays.

settings.question: WHERE ARE YOU LOCATED?
settings.answer: Tashola is based in London, UK. Our office address is 123 Oxford Street, London, W1D 1LT, United Kingdom.
